mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course (name, summary, author, orderNum, cover, video, status, content, create_time, user_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{summary}, #{author}, #{orderNum}, #{cover}, #{video}, #{status}, #{content}, #{createTime}, #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE course SET name = #{name}, summary = #{summary}, author = #{author}, orderNum = #{orderNum}, cover = #{cover}, video = #{video}, status = #{status}, content = #{content}, create_time = #{createTime} WHERE id = #{id}
